thread.title: Trump and Netanyahu Aligned Against Iran as Tensions Soar

author: Felicia Schwartz
title: Trump and Netanyahu Aligned Against Iran as Tensions Soar
text:
TEL AVIVâ€”The Trump and Netanyahu governments are moving in lockstep in defining Iran as a common enemy, setting a combative course as new tensions rise in the region.
U.S. President Donald Trump and Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu share the view that confronting and checking Iran is more important to regional stability than solving the Israel-Palestinian conflict, advisers to both men say.
